##Packages

```{r}
library(caret)
library(tidyverse)
source('Functions.r')
source('Data_Model.r')
library(factoextra)
```

## Get and Subset Data
```{r}
df = get_data_scaled()
```

## Generate Cluster Classification
``` {r}
set.seed(12345)
km = kmeans(df, 5, nstart=20)
(km$centers)
df$Cluster = km$cluster -1
```

## Elbow method to find best K
``` {r}
fviz_nbclust(df, kmeans, method="wss")
#Result is either 4 or 5
```

##Convert to "Success"
```{r}
df$Success = as.factor(ifelse(df$GradeClass < 2, 1, 0))
df$Cluster = as.factor(ifelse(df$Cluster < 2, 1, 0))
confusionMatrix(df$Success, df$Cluster)

saveRDS(df$Cluster, "cluster.rds")
```
